page.title: 18TRANSPORT,RECREATION SURVEYS
page.content: A{SURVEY}was made to find {MODES OF {TRANSPORT }owned by 100 families with children attending Emley First School. {CARS ARE MOST POPULAR. 57% have 1 car,36% 2 cars 3% 3 or more & 4% do not possess a car. {MOTORBIKE:}8% have 1,2% have 2 90% non {BICYCLES}are popular amongst children to play on.22% have 1, 36% have 2,36% have 3 or more and 6% don't have one. {CARAVANS,}usually a second home for holidays & weekend outings.Some are on permanent sites,e.g. at the coast, others are towed by car from site to site. 16% have 1 caravan,1% 2,83% non. {BOATS }6% have 1 motorised or sailing boat, 94% have non. {HOME ENTERTAINMENTS A survey was made of 100 families with children attending Emley First School to find out how they entertain themselves at home. {cont'd}
